comments:
When importing log files using the large log support, the following exception is
thrown:

--------------------------------------------------------

SELECT Table_Name, Id FROM Resource_Table WHERE URI =
'platform:/resource/LogAnalyzerProject6/DefaultMonitor1_amehregani_0_Friday,September23,200525513o'clockPMEDT-1127501713125_ApacheHTTPServerV1.3.20,V1.3.26,V2.0accesslogfiles__DB2.trcadb'
Thread[main,6,main] - ------------ JDBCHelper.executeQuery sqlString=SELECT
Table_Name, Id FROM Resource_Table WHERE URI =
'platform:/resource/LogAnalyzerProject6/DefaultMonitor1_amehregani_0_Friday,September23,200525513o'clockPMEDT-1127501713125_ApacheHTTPServerV1.3.20,V1.3.26,V2.0accesslogfiles__DB2.trcadb':
com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.SqlException: DB2 SQL error: SQLCODE: -103, SQLSTATE: 42604,
SQLERRMC: 1127501713125_ApacheHTTPServerV1
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.hd.e(hd.java:1659)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.hd.a(hd.java:1235)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.c.jb.h(jb.java:149)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.c.jb.a(jb.java:43)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.c.w.a(w.java:30)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.c.cc.g(cc.java:160)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.hd.n(hd.java:1215)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.hd.a(hd.java:1927)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.hd.a(hd.java:519)
	at com.ibm.db2.jcc.a.hd.executeQuery(hd.java:503)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.resources.database.internal.extensions.JDBCHelper.executeQuery(JDBCHelper.java:195)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.resources.database.internal.impl.GetTopLevelObjects.executeResourceTableQuery(GetTopLevelObjects.java:75)

---------------------------------------------

This is caused by the single quote that appears in the value of the URI field
"...25513o'clockPMEDT...".  Before making DB queries, the input should be
normalized before it is passed to the database.

traces.message: DB2 SQL error: SQLCODE: -103, SQLSTATE: 42604, SQLERRMC: 1127501713125_ApacheHTTPServerV1
